title: big_daddy
author: big_daddy
content: Hello everyone,I am currently in search of a talented pixel artist to join my team for an exciting new project.My team is developing a web3, blockchain-based video game that will feature an engaging and unique gameplay experience.The project is still in its early stages, and we are currently working on the creation of a genesis NFT collection while simultaneously starting with the game development.The ideal candidate will have experience with pixel art and a passion for video game development. You will be responsible for designing and creating high-quality pixel art assets that will be used in the game.If you are interested in learning more about the project and joining the team as a pixel artist, please feel free to respond to this post or send me a private message.You can find me on Twitter as well.
